titles.title: Safe Skies Act of 2018

To require the Secretary of Transportation to modify the final rule relating to flightcrew member duty and rest requirements for passenger operations of air carriers to apply to all-cargo operations of air carriers, and for other purposes.
Safe Skies Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary:
Safe Skies Act of 2018
This bill directs the Department of Transportation (DOT) to modify a specified DOT final rule relating to flight crew member duty and rest requirements so that the requirements under that rule apply to all-cargo flight crew members to the same extent they apply to air passenger flight crew members.
